CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the In-Store Promotion stage positioned above or below the Launch in Market stage?
SRP.A: The In-Store Promotion stage is positioned {below} the Launch in Market stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Retail Placement?
VE.A: The value of stage Retail Placement is {1944}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Product Concept?
VE.A: The value of stage Product Concept is {4856}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Product Concept, with a value of {4856}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is In-Store Promotion, with a value of {1702}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Taste Testing to stage Launch in Market?
SC.A: Decreased by {1103} Thousand Bottles from stage Taste Testing to stage Launch in Market.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Launch in Market to stage Retail Placement?
SC.A: Decreased by {383} Thousand Bottles from stage Launch in Market to stage Retail Placement.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 2135? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Product Concept} stage has {4856}, the {Taste Testing} stage has {3430}, the {Launch in Market} stage has {2327}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 2878? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Launch in Market} stage has {2327}, the {Retail Placement} stage has {1944}, the {In-Store Promotion} stage has {1702}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 1823 and 2878? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Launch in Market} stage has {2327}, the {Retail Placement} stage has {1944}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion, or from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Taste Testing} to {Launch in Market} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market, from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion, or from stage Product Concept to Taste Testing?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Product Concept} to stage {Taste Testing} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Product Concept} and {Taste Testing} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Retail Placement} and {In-Store Promotion} stages.
